name: Danmaku Artist (Downloadable)
description:
It's like Danmaku Designer but you can download it and it can probably handle more bullets!

Left click empty space to create a new emitter. Right click empty space to deselect emitters. Left click an emitter to select it, right click it to delete it.

` and tab to scroll up and down the parameter list, respectively.

ZX are +- 10
CV are +- 1
BN are +- 0.1
M, are +- 0.01
Shift key squares these values.

Use \ when highlighting an emitter to copy it.
